SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActorOfTheGame
Represents an actor within the game.
AnyElement
Represents any element within the game.
ElementReader
ElementReader class responsible for reading and processing elements from a Lexer.
ElementsOnGrid
Represents an element on the game grid with a specific visual representation (skin).
ElementsSet
Represents a set of valid elements in the game.
Enemy
Represents an enemy within the game.
FileAnalysis
Represents an analysis of a file, extracting information for game initialization.
Friend
Represents a friend within the game.
GameInformation
Constructs a new GameInformation object, initializing empty collections for enemies, friends, items, obstacles, and images.
Graphic
The Graphic class manages the graphical aspects of the game, including rendering elements on the graphics window.
GridReader
Class responsible for reading and processing grid-related information from the input file.
Item
Represents an item within the game.
Lexer
Lexer class for tokenizing input text.
Main
The main class that starts the game.
Obstacle
Represents an obstacle within the game.
Position
Represents a position with coordinates (i, j).
Result
Represents the result of a parsing operation, consisting of a token and its associated content.
Token
Enumeration of tokens used in the parser.
